answers.answer: Hi,did you get your labwork back for h pylori?C~

That type of pain can be caused by several things.  It can appedix so needs to be checked out.  A CT scan maybe needed.  I have been told appedix can come and go too before it gets severe but should never be ignored.It can also be a a kidney stone in the ureter.  As a woman it can also be bladde, ovarian or other issues.  What test have you had?
hi thank you my h. pylori came back negative , but by surprise  diabetes showed up , so it looks like my symptoms where caused by this , thank you
I hope you are doing much better soon.

question: hi , i dont know if im in the right place ....i just want to ask about my symptoms and see what people think .....two weeks ago i started having severe lower back pain which goes into an ache into my middle back  and pain in my lower right abdomen , i have a headache which wont go away even with pain killers , i feel generally unwell , i do not have a temperature ....my doctor thinks i have h.pylori , but i have no symptoms of gastric problems ....i wondered if it could be a problem with my kidneys , thank you
title: are these symptoms of kidney disease...help
